text: “apita bahutharayak gana gataluwak na.
mehema me ratata yanna puluwankamak thiyenawada..
ohuta apuru katahandak thibenawa.
ane ammapa anthima mohothe hari munta aaradhana pathre ganna kiyapu ekayi waradda.
eya kada wati aththe guwan thotupola aasannaye thibu wilakataya.
dan inne kawuda...
honda welawata mehe mi harak kafirla apita oonema thanaka mitn dagena unwama winasha karanna plan hithe hatiyata gahaganna dila un unge wada karagannawa.
jiwa widyathmaka palanaya kirime niyojithayan lesa da handunwana krumi palibodhakayange swabhawika sathuranta wilopikayan, paraposhithayan ha rogakaraka bija athulath we.
jalaya jiwaye parinamaya sandaha balapa athi thiranathmaka sadhakayaki.
kalaya kawa athi,api giya, oyala oona tharamak me blog awakashaye pinum gahana ekayi aththe.
dan mahinda ehema kiwwada?
ee me widihata..
prayogika wisandum kiyanne monawada kiyala ahalawath naha.
kapa kirim mathin jayagrahanaya kara
meka trayi karala awith kiyannamko kohomada gugal lage sarwis eka kiyala.
waidya wruththiya hara wenath oonama saukhya sewa wruththiyak, saukhya kamkaru wruththiyak ho labagena ihalata yamata puluwan.”
menisa dahame kiyala athi de baliya yuthuyi.
mage mahaththayawath mata udaw karanna ba kiyanakota mata puluwanda wena kenekugen udaw illanna"

baya wenna opa monawathma wenne naha.thiyena ekama de andurini eliyata ena eka.sampradayanta garu kala yuthu unath andha de wishwasa karanna epa.thaththekuta duwek hadanna hodanam.kawanna powanna athi dadi karanna hodanam.jiwath karawanna hodanam jiwitha kalayatama,oya dawas deka thuna thathwa dakkata waradak wenne naha.dannawada malli mama mage jiwithaya godak sarwa sampurnawa gewana kenek.ehehamanam matath waradinna ooni.ehema une naha.

ee wagema purna unmadayata goduru wela nathi wunath ee la`ga hariye thamayi ee gollonge paursha lakshana gawasemin thibune.

ee wana wita, warak thama nila kamarayata amila kandawu magasin bandhanagara pradhaniyeku, umbaa panala yanna giya kiyala wedi thiyala danawayayi ohuta tharjanaya kara thibuni.
